DOC.detailed_description: Background : Oral epithelial dysplasia ( OED ) one common precancerous lesion among Chinese adult . To investigate clinical predictive value p16 hydroxymethylation diagnostic reagent early diagnosis oral cancer , investigator carry prospective multi-center double-blind cohort study . Methods:336 patient histologically confirm mild moderate OED include present study . After bisulfite modification tet assistant bisulfite modification , MethyLight Methylation-specific PCR ( MSP ) assay use analyze p16 methylation status patient . Building three follow-up queue p16-methylated , p16-hydroxymethylation p16-unmethylated . The Statistical analysis use SPSS16.0 . All P-values two-sided . P < 0.05 consider test statistical significance difference .
